chapter.title: Handling Long URLs
chapter.para: URLs can be quite a bit longer than 80 columns. This chapter includes the same long example in likely contexts.
This para includes a link with a long URL: .

This para includes the same link in a literal: https://long.example.com:8443/app/json/container?_queryFilter=userName+eq+"bjensen@example.com"&_fields=displayName,contactInformation/emailAddress&_prettyPrint=true.
